SgAsmBlock* putInstructionsIntoFunctions (  SgAsmBlock *  blk,
const DisassemblerCommon::FunctionStarts &  functionStarts
) 
 

Using the list of function entry addresses, create an SgAsmBlock containing a list of SgAsmFunctionDeclaration objects, each of which has the list of basic blocks for the particular function.
